arts.ttl: Burnley player ratings vs Portsmouth as 'remarkable' 8/10 handed out but four 5/10s - gallery
arts.sum: Burnley kept an eighth straight clean sheet but lost further ground on the top two after playing out yet another goalless draw – this time against lowly Portsmouth.

arts.ttl: Andre Dozzell responds to Portsmouth controversy after Burnley boss left furious over Fratton Park draw
arts.sum: Andre Dozzell weighed into late Fratton Park controversy and insisted: It wasn’t a penalty.

arts.ttl: Brownhill and Koleosho Burnley absences explained as Scott Parker responds to Marcus Edwards links
arts.sum: Josh Brownhill and Luca Koleosho both missed Burnley’s goalless draw with Portsmouth through injury.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth boss lifts lid on Sunderland signing drama and outlook over further deals
arts.sum: John Mousinho insisted he was never concerned over a deal for Adil Aouchiche collapsing after his dramatic Pompey arrival.

arts.ttl: Scott Parker's immediate reaction as Portsmouth hold Burnley to 10th goalless draw of the season
arts.sum: Scott Parker admitted his Burnley side were far from their best during their goalless draw against struggling Portsmouth.

arts.ttl: Transfer news and rumours: Kelechi Iheanacho to Celtic, Patrick Wimmer to Leicester City, Marcus Edwards to Burnley
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the latest transfer news and rumours, including Kelechi Iheanacho to Celtic, Patrick Wimmer to Leicester City and Marcus Edwards to Burnley.

arts.ttl: Burnley held by Portsmouth to lose ground on two top
arts.sum: James Trafford kept his 20th clean sheet of the season.

arts.ttl: 'Will rue late miss, Absolutely everywhere, Made huge difference': Neil Allen's Portsmouth player ratings against Burnley
arts.sum: Pompey shared a highly-credible goalless draw against promotion-hunting Burnley at Fratton Park.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth 0-0 Burnley: Clarets lose ground in fight for promotion with 10th goalless draw
arts.sum: Burnley lost further ground in the race for automatic promotion after playing out yet another goalless draw – this time with relegation-battling Portsmouth.

arts.ttl: Determined Portsmouth can't break down resolute promotion chasers Burnley
arts.sum: Pompey couldn’t breach Burnley’s impregnable defence as it finished goalless at Fratton.
